question: Which country was the location of social discrimination phenomena "Antihaitianismo"?
explanation: The Dominican Republic was the location of social discrimination phenomena "Antihaitianismo". Antihaitianismo, also called anti-Haitianism, is prejudice or social discrimination against Haitians in the Dominican Republic. Antihaitianismo includes prejudice against, hatred of, or discrimination against Haitians due to their physical appearance, culture, lifestyle, language; not strictly their race.
